name: X’ho_Next_Dimension
description:
X’ho_Next_Dimension
2840 x 4592 px

For me, LUCIFUGOUS by X’ho + Arcn Templ was one of his best works that I like. It was dark, honest, and authentic—Onward to the next dimension, what better way to pay X’ho by doing what I do best. Create artwork of my impression of him to commemorate this legendary Singapore icon.

I have decided to mint the artwork as an NFT on HEN because this punk platform befits his rebellious character.

Taken from the book Skew Me U Rebel Meh? He expressed his desire for his obituary to read “X’Ho. Age: Forever 27 (the real age is none of anyone’s business)". 

The artwork will be in a limited edition of 27.

Head on down to collect the artwork for FREE on HEN. Just for fans!

Rest In Power! X'ho Forever!
